thumb.description: EternalçŸ¥ã‚‰ã‚Œã–ã‚‹ç½ªæ‚ªæ„Ÿã€èƒ¸ã‚’ç· ã‚ä»˜ã‘ã‚‹ç—›ã¿å£Šã‚ŒãŸæ™‚è¨ˆãŒæ™‚ã‚’åˆ»ã‚€ã€æ­¢ã¾ã£ãŸé‡ã¯æˆ»ã‚‰ãªã„è¿·ãˆã‚‹é­‚ãŒå½·å¾¨ã†ã‹ã™ã‹ã«èã“ãˆã‚‹ã€å„ªã—ãç§ã‚’å‘¼ã¶èª°ã‹ã®å£°ã§ã‚‚ãã‚Œã¯å±Šã‹ãªã„é ã„å£°ã©ã†ã‹å®‰ã‚‰ã‹ã«çœ ã‚‰ã›ã¦ãã ã•ã„è¨±ã—ã¯æ±‚ã‚ã¾ã›ã‚“ã€ãŸã é™å¯‚ã®å®‰ã‚‰ãã‚’æ°¸é ã®çœ ã‚Šã€æ·±ã„é—‡ã®ä¸­ã¸A distorted mirror reflects me, white hands stained with bloodUnknown guilt, pain that tightens my chestA broken clock ticks time, the stopped hands will not returnJust walking like an empty shell, a lost soul wandersI can faintly hear someone's voice, calling out to me gentlyBut it's a distant voice that doesn't reach me, a fading hopeAngel of slaughter, rest your wings, please let me sleep peacefullyThese blood-stained hands will no longer hurt peopleI don't ask for forgiveness, I just wish for the peace of silenceAngel of slaughter, eternal sleep, into the deep darknessMusic,Lyric,All Sound Prog : SonataIllust : Untold story
